wikipedia_page.main: Paula Sage (born c. 1980) is a Scottish actress, Special Olympics netball player, and advocate for people with Down syndrome.

response: AfterLife is a 2003 drama film set in Scotland directed by Alison Peebles and written by Andrea Gibb. It stars Lindsay Duncan, Kevin McKidd, Paula Sage, and James Laurenson. Afterlife won the Audience Award at The Edinburgh Film Festival 2003. Sage's role won her a BAFTA Scotland award for best first time performance and Best Actress in the Bratislava International Film Festival, 2004.
*Best Actress - Lindsay Duncan and Paula Sage (AfterLife, United Kingdom)
*Paula Sage (born ), Scottish actress, Special Olympian, advocate
